text:
TIRUNELVELI

Manonmaniam Sundaranar University: 23rd convocation, K. Rosaiah, Governor of Tamil Nadu, presides, P. Palaniappan, Minister for Higher Education, delivers special address, H. Devaraj, Vice-Chairman, University Grants Commission, New Delhi, delivers convocation address, MSU premises, Abhishekapatti, 11.30 a.m.

Sadakkathullah Appa College: Sadhaavadhaani Seyhuthambi Paavalar Trust lecture, T.E.S. Fathu Rabbani, correspondent of the college, presides, U. Ali Bhava, Department of Tamil, Bharathidasan University, Tiruchi, delivers lecture, college premises, Rahmath Nagar, 11 a.m.

V.K. Nursery and Primary School: 40th annual day celebrations, school premises, Tirunelveli Town, 4 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, St. Xavier’s Cathedral Silver Jubilee Library Hall, Palayamkottai, 7 p.m.
title: Engagements
